Sentece: Evaluation of the plasma pharmacokinetics revealed a rapid, but low extent of absorption of OLZ (peak concentrations around 1 microg/mL at 0.5-1.5 h), and a delayed minimal absorption of 5-ASA (concentrations < 0.2 microg/mL, at 11-35 h), which is immediately metabolized to Ac-5-ASA.
Title: Study of the plasma pharmacokinetics and faecal excretion of the prodrug olsalazine and its metabolites after oral administration to horses.
Name: Olsalazine

Sentece: As indicators of the local availability in the colon, high faecal water concentrations of 5-ASA and Ac-5-ASA (mean C(max) about 300 and 130 microg/mL, respectively), but only traces of OLZ were found in faeces excreted 18-50 h after dosing.
Title: Study of the plasma pharmacokinetics and faecal excretion of the prodrug olsalazine and its metabolites after oral administration to horses.
